metadata.description: Covert operative Claire Chartrand has a dozen guns pointed at her - and that's the least of her worries! The same betrayal that lands her in an impossible situation during a critical mission also reveals Claire's true occupation to her two identical sisters - a scientist and a model - who now discover that the company Claire works for is partially responsible for the professional success they thought they'd earned on their own.
metadata.name: 3 (three)
